name: Rope Car and The Bomb Game.
name_original: Rope Car and The Bomb Game.
description:
Get ready to cut the rope like never before. If you are looking for a very relaxing and stress busting time, then the Rope Cut game is the best one for you.

Hop onto this amazing journey where you cut the rope and make the bomb land on the car. The rope cutting game is a familiar to play yet challenging to master.

The Rope Car and The Bomb Game is based on real world physics where you see a bomb hanging off a rope. You need to aim at the moving car's dicky and make the bomb land on it without exploding. This is where the challenging part of this rope cutting game is. You need to be very decisive when it comes to slicing the rope and dropping the bomb.

Features of Rope Car and The Bomb Game

Real world physics simulation of the rope.

40 plus levels to play and master the slicing rope mechanism.

Cool graphics and awesome sound effects.

Easy to play but difficult to master.

If when you cut the rope and it falls on the car, then the car will explode and the game will be over. Or if the bomb when you do a rope cut, then also the game will be over. The cut the rope game helps improve your concentration levels and the game helps you regain focus. 

There are 40 plus levels to the rope cutting game. If you want to keep your brain fit and improve your problem solving skills, then the rope cut game is the best option for you. You will find a car moving from the left to the right below. If the car were stable and stayed stationary, then landing the bomb in the dicky of the car would have been easy. But here the car keeps on moving constantly. So you have to wait for the right moment before cutting the rope. If you mistime the rope cutting , then the game will be over.

As the level proceeds further, the speed of the car will keep increase and so you will need to be extra cautious while cutting the rope. Along with this, the oscillation of the rope will keep increasing as you proceed to the subsequent levels. If you master the cut the rope game, then your concentration levels and your agility would both improve dramatically. The Rope Cutting game is a perfect stress buster when it comes to having a relaxing game play experience. 

The rope cut game also displays whether you hit the car perfectly or not. If the bomb falls right in the center of the dickey it will be a good score. If the bomb falls towards the sides of the dicky, it will be considered an average rope cut. If you fail to land the bomb on the car, the rope cutting game will show you by what distance you missed the car's dicky.

The graphics are cool and combined with the sound and the gameplay, you will not wink away from this game. If you are looking to spend your time in a creative manner, then the rope cutting game is the best option for you. The rope cut game has a cheerful and relaxing atmosphere.

If you liked this game, then do share this game with your friends on social media networks. Please give your honest review about this game. This will help us improve the game a lot.
